title: Finally!
content: Any woman who has different flow rates during that time of the month, knows that is product is a huge bonus. The 3 different assortment for coverage from saves me from buying 3 different varieties. The plastic pearl applicator is pain free, an of course, they are easy to use and carry discretely in your purse or pockets. I've used the Tampax brand for years and love this new assortment of 3 sizes in one box.I am safe and protected using the Tampax brand. Thank you!
